page.title: 02VILLAGE HALL BURTON LAZARS
page.content: The different{clubs}and{activities they have in Burton Lazars village Hall include sometimes Bingo. Every so often they have a Country and Western.They hold Birthday{parties}and Wedding Receptions. About once a year they have a disco. Every so often they have a Cheese and Wine evening that most of the people go to. Sometimes people who have shoe shops come to the {village hall}and have a sale. Sometimes they have a Jumble Sale or Bring and Buy.Quite often they have Coffee Mornings or Coffee Evenings.The church uses it on a Sunday mornings. People in the village or from Melton Mowbray hold meetings there.They used to hold a club called Pop Mobility. They also have fetes there.
